briefTitle: GWPCARE2 A Study to Investigate the Efficacy and Safety of Cannabidiol (GWP42003-P) in Children and Young Adults With Dravet Syndrome
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study to Investigate the Efficacy and Safety of Cannabidiol (GWP42003-P) in Children and Young Adults With Dravet Syndrome.
summary: To investigate the potential antiepileptic effects of cannabidiol (GWP42003-P) in children and young adults with Dravet syndrome.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change In Convulsive Seizures During The Treatment Period Compared To Baseline
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline to Day 99 or Early Termination (ET)
